dmca.title: www.roguethumbs.com Copyright infringment
dmca.body:
nc

  _____  

From: Russ Clow [mailto:russclow@clubskill.com] 
Sent: Monday, April 04, 2005 6:00 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: www.roguethumbs.com Copyright infringment


Dear ThePlanet,
                     My name is Russ Clow and I am the lead designer at
www.clubskill.com, a popular UK gaming site.  
We were recently notified by our visitors that www.roguethumbs.com have
taken our images and used them on
his site.  We investigated this matter and it appears to be true.
 
Upon closer inspection we found that roguethumbs.com has an images folder
with all of our site images in.  This can
be found at www.roguethumbs.com/images.  To be more precise, I have pulled
out just a few examples of his images
compared to ours:
 
forum.jpg
Our Link:  http://www.clubskill.com/gfx/contentimg/forum.jpg
His Link:  http://www.roguethumbs.com/images/forum.jpg
 
gamebanner.jpg
 
Our Link:  http://www.clubskill.com/gfx/articles/gamebanner.jpg
His Link:  http://www.roguethumbs.com/images/gamebanner.jpg
 
gcn.gif
 
Our Link:  http://www.clubskill.com/images/systems/gcn.gif
His Link:  http://www.roguethumbs.com/images/gcn.gif
 
These are just a few examples.  his actual site layout is similar to ours
also.
I can assure you that this user has NOT had permission from me or any of our
staff to use these images on his site.  
 
Our Copyright notice is clearly stated at the bottom of our site:
 
Program, design and content copyright 2002-2005 CLUB SKILL MEDIA, co. All
assets and content are property of their respective owners
 
I performed a WHOIS on the domain and it lead me to your site, so i believe
this user is hosted on your servers. 
 
I ask politely that you ensure that this user stops using our images and
does not steal copyrighted images from other sites at a 
different time.
 
I greatly appreciate your help in this matter.
 
Russ Clow
russclow@clubskill.com
